name: BinGAME 2
description:
Binary Game 2 is an implementation of a similar game from Cisco as an application for Windows, Linux and Android. Unlike the original game, the program does not depend on the presence of a Flash-player, the increase in complexity is planned somewhat differently.

The player's task is to represent the number written to the left of the chain in binary code. By clicking the mouse, you can change the state of any bit. The number corresponding to the typed binary code is shown to the right of the bitstring. As soon as the correct binary representation is typed in some chain, this chain disappears.

Get free Android Version on: https://mefccplusstudios.ru/static/bg2/bg2_android.apk

For Desktop (Windows/Linux) you must install Java JRE 8 and above.

WARNING: I am not dealing with a refund!

After purchase, you will receive a Jar file that is launched by double clicking, provided that you have correctly installed Java JRE 8 or higher.

Porting to Linux/Android: M.E.F.C C+ Studios, Ind.
